feature.correlation

Class SpearmanCorrelation

  • java.lang.Object
    • feature.correlation.CorrelationCoefficient
      • feature.correlation.SpearmanCorrelation

  • public class SpearmanCorrelation
extends CorrelationCoefficient
    This class implements the Spearman correlation coefficient that is essentially rank correlation and is capable of capturing some forms of non-linear correlation.
